description: This file defines an in-memory repository implementation for Note objects within a notes application. It provides thread-safe CRUD operations and a method to seed sample data for development/testing purposes.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe, in-memory implementation of the INoteRepository interface for managing notes.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Returns all notes ordered by last update time descending.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Adds a new note to the store.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns false if the note does not exist.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note by its ID; returns true if successful.

methods.name: SeedIfEmpty
methods.description: Seeds initial notes if the store is empty for development/testing.
